content.p: Your organisation can help us to change lives and shape the new world. We work with a variety of corporate partners who support essential research, improve student experience, provide opportunities for graduates and help to boost the local economy. The University of Nottingham was founded on the philanthropy of Sir Jesse Boot, who donated the land on which University Park Campus now stands. We’re proud to work with partners including Santander, GlaxoSmithKline, Walgreen Boots, Caterpillar, Gleeds, David Wilson Homes, ABInBev and Enterprise-Rent-A-Car. Make a significant and tangible impact on causes you’re interested in. Here are some of the initiatives you can support: Chat to our team to see how your company can make a difference. Tel +44 (0)115 846 7213 Email supportus@nottingham.ac.uk Campaign and Alumni Relations Office Ground Floor, Pope Building The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD
